title: Xprim777
author: Xprim777
content: Hello, I would like to sell these 5 Polymerbit notes. All notes come with a protective holder, and a hologram (except lot 2)Lot 1 : 0.1 BTC - #722/1000The first Polymerbit note, a timeless classic. I don't have the numbered hologram, so it comes with a standard hologramLot 2 : $50 Script Note - #57/ ? Unredeemed, the code is expired. Lot 3 : 1000 Gulden - #72/100 A nice note from 2017. We don't often see it on the forum.Lot 4 : 20 Viacoin A beautiful note with Claus Peter Schnorr, a famous German mathematician and cryptographer. 100 notes were printed. Lot 5: 500 Viacoin An other Viacoin note, but with the well known Nikola Tesla. Only 50 notes were produced.Starting bid per lot: 0.001 BTCMinimum bid increments on each lot : 0.0001 BTC End time : Sunday 22th October 2023, 23h UTC+1 (Paris time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes before the auction end extend the auction for 10 minutes.Payment : 3Q7UvXQLqLpNaWwNLFPXVzhEXdP8qYzGrzShipping : $10 worldwide with trackingEscrow accepted, winner pays fees.

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: what do you mean on LOT2 with your comment say "Unredeemed, the code is expired." can you please give more detail? also if i understand correctly non of these notes have active private keys created by Polymerbit, they are all DIY ? ty so much =)

comments.author: Xprim777
comments.body: Quote from: rsincognito on October 20, 2023, 03:29:09 PMwhat do you mean on LOT2 with your comment say "Unredeemed, the code is expired." can you please give more detail? also if i understand correctly non of these notes have active private keys created by Polymerbit, they are all DIY ? ty so much =)Hi rsincognito. Lot 2 is a scrip note, it's like a voucher. Behind the hologram, there's a code that gave you a $50 discount on your Polymerbit order.I have never used it, and the code has expired on February 2020. The hologram is intact. All the other lots are DIY note, none of these have a private key. If you want to fund them, you have to generate your keys and you can use the hologram to keep the private key hidden.

comments.author: Xprim777
